name: zotero-auto-tagger
description: AI-powered auto-tagging for Zotero. Automatically generates keyword tags using PubMed MeSH terms for biomedical content and Claude AI for everything else.
author: David Nunn

scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && cd build && zip -r ../zotero-auto-tagger.xpi * -x '*.DS_Store' && cd ..
